headlines.description: — Ollie Watkins scored for the fifth successive match as Aston Villa beat Everton 2-0 to end Sean Dyche’s 100% home record and drop his team back into the English Premier League relegation zone on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Watkins scores again, Aston Villa beats Everton 2-0 in EPL

headlines.description: New Leeds United manager Javi Gracia's reign began with a 1-0 Premier League home victory over bottom club Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Firpo earns Leeds precious win over bottom side Southampton

headlines.description: Arsenal regained a five-point lead in the Premier League title race as they edged Leicester City with a 1-0 win at the King Power Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal open 5-point lead with win vs. Leicester

events.name: Nottingham Forest at West Ham United

headlines.description: West Ham United striker Danny Ings bagged his first two goals for the club in an emphatic 4-0 win over fellow strugglers Nottingham Forest.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ings double powers West Ham to big win over Forest

headlines.description: Manchester City kept pace in the Premier League title race with a 4-0 mauling of relegation-threatened Bournemouth at the Vitality Stadium.
headlines.shortLinkText: Haaland bags City record in Bournemouth rout

headlines.description: Liverpool completed a difficult week with a frustrating 0-0 draw at Crystal Palace on Saturday in a blow to their top-four hopes.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool struggle to goalless draw at Palace
